## Notes

Notes here suggest 1855 as death date. https://p-rr-tt.org.uk/NA/Frederick.shtml#i1369 --- According to Irey obit: Lived in Dora, then moved to Andrews. Sept 2 1861, Amos Parrett died. Children: Martha,James,Mary,Eliza,Amy,John fr Lagro
